name: MIAW MCP Server
description: Connect ChatGPT to Salesforce Enhanced Chat (MIAW) - enables seamless handoffs to Salesforce agents (both AI and human)

MIAW_SCRT_URL.description: Salesforce Chat Runtime URL (SCRT URL) - Find in: Setup → Embedded Service Deployments → Your Deployment → View. Format: https://scrt01.uengage1.sfdc-yfeipo.svc.sfdcfc.net

MIAW_ES_DEVELOPER_NAME.description: Embedded Service Deployment Developer Name (API Name) - Find in: Setup → Embedded Service Deployments → API Name column. Example: Target_Messaging_for_In_App_and_Web

MIAW_ORG_ID.description: Salesforce Organization ID - Find in: Setup → Company Information → Organization ID. Format: 00D followed by 15 characters

MCP_TRANSPORT.description: Transport mode for MCP (use 'http' for Heroku deployment)

PORT.description: Port for HTTP server (Heroku automatically assigns this)
